title: DECORA Drinking Straws Cleaning Brushes Nylon Pipe Cleaner Brush Kits for Assorted Size Straws Pack of 12
features: Attribute: the straw brushes are made of food grade stainless steel and nylon wool, measures 20cm/7.87 inch in length and 12 different diameter from 2mm to 30mm/0.08 to 1.18 inch,durable and convenient!

Special Design:handle of the drinking straws cleaner is made of twisted steel, sturdy and stainless and the nylon bristle is appropriately flexible with no shedding,all brush kits are tied in a round ring for easy storage and space saving!

Value Pack:one set contains 12 pieces of pipe cleaning brushes with assorted size and suitable hardness, perfect to access any blind angles and clean all spaces with great ease, best solution for cleaning pipes with small sized opening.

Wide Application: this set of cleaning brush kits are perfect for almost all drinking straw and water bottle straw,funnel necks, teapot necks, tube or cylinder and even good for cleaning cell phones, colanders, drip tips, espresso machines, glasses bottles, etc.
Notice:these drinking straws brushes are dishwash safe and rinse with warm water and soap before use is strongly recommended; please clean the brushes and hang to dry after use.
description: Specification:content: drinking straws cleaning brushes x 10size: length-20cm/7.87 inch diameter-2mm/0.08in 3mm/0.12in 5mm/0.2in 6mm/0.24in 8mm/0.32in 10mm/0.4in 12mm/0.47in 16mm/0.63in 20mm/0.79in 24mm/0.94in 26mm/1.06in and 30mm/1.18in.material: stainless steel handle and nylon bristleIs the brush flexible?The bristle of the brush is quite soft, which can be slightly bended to a certain angle to clean hard-reach space, please note not to bend sharply, because it may cause damage to the brushes.Your daily necessity!This set of cleaning brushes are super useful in our daily life, which can not only be used to clean any size of straws and pipes, but also suitable for cleaning many items with small opening and hard-reach angles, like keyboard, cell phones, glasses, makeup containers and more, help you clean your stuff with great ease and convenience!
